item.title: [Python] Programming languages that protect the public from NHK
item.description: #Introduction The other day, an article [Mathematics] Protecting NHK from the party Protecting NHK from party Protecting the party from NHK Protecting the party from NHK was posted on Qiita. It was. This article defines a party grammar that protects the public from NHK. When I read this, I thought: “How wonderful it would be to write a program with this grammar” #Combinator logic The grammar that protects the people from NHK can unambiguously describe a binary tree that has two types of leaves, NHK and people.
